A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointing. I get trying to subvert audience expectations however this film betrays the lore established in the the media before it. Nothing seems right. This movie holds no balance in an already established saga. This seems like a pet project of the director/writer's than an actual installment to a series. So many question ignored\, so many expectations shattered and in a way that just cripples the story. So many elements unnecessarily added for no actual benefit at all.
